attributes.action: Scrap the plans to give Thatcher a State Funeral.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thatcher has done nothing to deserve the tax payer paying out approx £3 million pounds on a state funeral.  She should not be given that honour,if the tory's want her to have a big funeral then they should pay for it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
